name: Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless chicken breast, sliced thin
instructions: Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, and chicken broth in a small bowl
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat
Add chicken and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until cooked through
Add remaining oil to the wok
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add broccoli, bell pepper, and snap peas, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Pour sauce over everything and stir until thickened, about 1-2 minutes
notes: The key to a good stir-fry is high heat and quick cooking. Have all ingredients prepped before you start cooking. Feel free to substitute vegetables based on what you have available.
